title: Warehouse Operations Manual
content:
# Warehouse Operations Manual

## Daily Procedures

### Morning Checklist
1. Review overnight orders
2. Check low-stock alerts
3. Verify expected deliveries
4. Print pick lists for day
5. Inspect equipment

### Receiving Process
1. Scan incoming shipment barcode
2. Count physical items
3. Compare to packing slip
4. Report discrepancies
5. Update inventory system
6. Put away to assigned locations

### Picking Process
1. Receive pick list from system
2. Navigate to bin locations
3. Scan product barcodes
4. Verify quantity
5. Place in tote/box
6. Mark as picked in system

### Packing Process
1. Verify all items present
2. Select appropriate box size
3. Add packing materials
4. Include packing slip
5. Seal and weigh
6. Print shipping label
7. Move to shipping zone

### Shipping Process
1. Scan package for shipping
2. Verify carrier and service level
3. Place on correct pallet/cart
4. Await carrier pickup
5. Scan out on collection

## Inventory Accuracy
- Cycle counting daily
- Full inventory audit quarterly
- 99.5% accuracy target

## Safety Procedures
- Proper lifting techniques
- Equipment inspections
- Emergency procedures
- PPE requirements

## System Access
- Warehouse Management System (WMS)
- Handheld scanners
- Desktop terminals
- Mobile app
